Question
========

A psychologist researches the relationship between sick leave (*ziekteverzuim*) as measured in hours per year, exercise (*beweging*) as measured in hours of sport per month and job satisfaction (*tevredenheid*) as measured on a Likert scale from 1: very unsatisfied to 5: very satisfied.

![](vufgb-prediction-002-en-table01.jpg)

What is, according to estimated regression equation, the predicted number of sick leave hours per year for an employee who exercises for 4 hours per month and who is very satisfied with the job?
  
  
Answerlist
----------
* 11.74 hours
* 18.92 hours
* 20.96 hours
* 30.18 hours

Solution
========

Answerlist

* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
